name: Street Madness
description:
Street Madness is a time trial/Racing game. You can choose different cars all with different speeds, different handling and there will be lots of diverse maps to race on.

At the moment there is only one unfinished map and one car which is an Audi R8 and there are only time trials at the moment. To see the progress of the game, follow us and keep track of out devlogs.
